column4: I'm keen to do a bit of a slideshow + desktop presentation of my linux user experience with a voice recording added in.. preferably at the same time in one nice app..
are there any apps built for the job?
sudo ehtotam
sudo gedit /boot/grub/menu.lst for example ehtotam
super user do..
no worries
hope you made a backup just in case ehtotam ;)
wireless Orgullomoore?
no, I'm connected through a cable to my router, which is connected to a cable connection
and when I'm disconnected, it instantly reconnects..but I would still lose an IRC connection, for example. And my router continues to show connectivity
have another computer on the network to test with.. (trying to rule out the possibility of the router packing a sad)
<nod>, I've tried it on this same computer on Knoppix--works fine. Tried it on another computer under Windows, also works fine.
haha, I've tried that too...I'm actually connected through two ethernet cards...different brands and all
oh hmm.. is the network connections (both) bridged with the router?
I'm no networking expert...but when 1 is active, the other is not...I don't know how to make them both work at the same time. When I disconnect one, the other one takes over
no, I don't need two. I just connected the second one after having so many problems with the first and figured it might help. But it doesn't.
sure
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/16676
excuse me?
'ta a way of saying thanks'.. anyway, those errors aren't nice at all.. could be packet collisons or something
want to try with just one card (just the new one)
sounds like a good idea, I'll disconnect the first and we'll see how it goes
